title: Lauren Goodger makes a bleary-eyed exit from nightclub after partying until 5am with pals
text:
Lauren Goodger made a bleary-eyed exit from Tape nightclub in London on Sunday morning, after partying with pals till 5am.

The reality star, 33, cut a glamorous figure in a plunging black satin top, which drew attention to her ample cleavage with its sheer vest insert.

Lauren looked like she having the time of her life during the wild night out and took to Instagram to share a sizzling snap of herself posing with her female friend.

Worse for wear: Lauren Goodger made a bleary-eyed exit from Tape nightclub in London on Sunday morning, after partying with pals till 5am

Lauren teamed the plunging top with tailored cuffed trousers and added a boost to her height with perspex heels.

She wore her brunette tresses in a sleek straight centre-parting and accentuated her golden tan with a full face of make-up.

After dancing the night away, Lauren looked a little worse for wear as she left the club with her male pal.

Partying up a storm: Lauren looked like she having the time of her life during the wild night out and took to Instagram to share a sizzling snap of her posing with her female friend

Bleary-eyed exit: After dancing the night away, Lauren looked a little worse for wear as she left the club with her male pal

Lauren's night on the town comes amid claims she feels 'betrayed and upset' after her close pal Yazmin Oukhellou dated her jailbird ex Jake McLean.

The reality star has reportedly been putting on a 'brave face' since discovering their short-lived romance through 'word of mouth' instead of through the duo themselves.

According to reports, Lauren, who dated Jake for four years between 2012 and 2016, has been telling pals she can't see how she can be friends with Yazmin again, especially after she confided in her about Jake during a girls' holiday in July.

Busty display: The reality star, 33, cut a glamorous figure in a plunging black satin top, which drew attention to her ample cleavage with its sheer vest insert

A source told Closer: 'Yaz was someone she opened up to about Jake, so for her to go behind her back and date him, knowing how upset that would make Lauren, feels like a low blow.

'She doesn't want to have a big showdown with Yaz, but she's told pals she can't see how they can be friends again. She's heartbroken.

'Yaz knew how Lauren felt about Jake because she opened up to her about their on-off romance during the girls' holiday in July,' they added: 'Lauren felt like she was a great friend to her and they were really close.'

They added that Lauren wanted to 'feel positive about dating' but is now 'scared to open up'.

Betrayal: Lauren's night on the town comes amid claims she feels 'betrayed and upset' after her close pal Yazmin Oukhellou (pictured last month) dated her jailbird ex Jake McLean

While a different source told New!: 'Everyone knew Lauren still had feelings for Jake - including Yaz, seeing your ex with someone else is hard, let alone when they're meant to be one of your best friends. It's doubly heartbreaking.

'She has found it all so hard and is so upset. She was with Jake for four years and he was the love of her life. She feels betrayed and hurt.

'Lauren doesn't let many friends in and she let Yaz in and now she has done this. It's been a tough few weeks for her and her anxiety and stress shave been through the roof.'

MailOnline has contacted Lauren's representatives for comment.
description: Lauren Goodger made a bleary-eyed exit from Tape nightclub in London on Sunday morning, after partying with pals till 5am.
